params.loanId: The loan ID with pending cross-chain transfer

returns.vaultAddress: The address of the created vault

returns.claimed: Whether funds have been claimed by agent

params.targetChainId: Target chain ID for cross-chain disbursement (0 = same chain)

returns.loanId: The ID of the issued loan
